full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON RIN PO CHE'I PHRENG BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,MNGON PAR RTOGS PA'I RGYAN GYI BSDUS DON, RIN CHEN 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, MDO SNGAGS KYI GZHUNG MANG DU MKHYEN PA'I SDOM BRTZON DU, MAS BSKUL ZHING, KHYAD PAR DU YANG, MTSO STON DKA' BZHI PA SANGS RGYAS 'PHEL GYIS LAS DANG PO LA 'JUG PA BDE BA'I YAN LAG TU GYIS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, RIGS SMRA BA DAR MA RIN CHEN GYIS 'BROG RI BO CHE DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON SDE SNOD 'DZIN PA RIN CHEN CHOS RGYAL LO, ,'DIS KYANG BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE SGO THAMS CAD NAS PHYOGS THAMS CAD DU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR BYED NUS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,SVA STI, RGYAL BSTAN PAD TSAL PHAN BDE'I DRI BSUNG CAN, ,BSHAD SGRUB 'DAB RGYAS RNAM GROL SBRANG RTZI'I BCUD, ,'GRO KUN SPYOD PHYIR DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING, ,CHOS SDE CHE NAS CHOS SBYIN CHAR 'DI SPEL, , MANGGA LAm, ,
publisher_(хэвлэсэн_буюу_бүтээсэн_хийд_б: DGE LDAN RNAM PAR RGYAL BA'I GLING, DGA' LDAN THEG CHEN GLING,
